exceptions.tactic: apply intro_nat_injection with (f := fun p => match p with | xH => 1 | xO p => 2 * p | xI p => 1 + (2 * p) end).
exceptions.exn: In environment p : positive p0 : positive The term "p0" has type "positive" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: apply intro_nat_injection with (f := fun p => match p with | xH => 1 | xO p => 2 * p | xI p => 1 + (2 * p) end). intros p1 p2 H; destruct p1, p2; try (inversion H); try auto; simpl in H; try (inversion H; subst); clear H; auto.
